meanings.sent1: The teacher was dispensing candies to the students.
meanings.sent2: The postman was dispensing letters to the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned, dispensing candies everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a dispenser, dispensing joy to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The fountain in the park seemed to be dispensing endless water.

meanings.sent1: The nurse was dispensing medicine to the patients.
meanings.sent2: The manager was dispensing tasks to the employees.
meanings.sent3: The magician was dispensing tricks left and right.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to be a dispenser, dispensing moments to cherish.
meanings.sent5: The chef was like an artist, dispensing flavors in every dish.

meanings.sent1: The treasurer was dispensing funds for the project.
meanings.sent2: The charity was dispensing resources to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine kept dispensing snacks without coins!
meanings.sent4: The sun was like a dispenser, dispensing warmth to the earth.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was dispensing seeds for a bountiful harvest.
